description: This source file defines API routes for managing songs in a music library backend. It includes endpoints to list songs, upload new MP3 files with validation, and stream existing songs. The module interacts with a database and the filesystem, and uses FastAPI for web framework functionalities.

methods.name: Path _media_root()
methods.description: Returns the Path object for the media storage directory, configurable via environment variable.

methods.name: int _max_file_bytes()
methods.description: Determines the maximum allowed upload size in bytes, with a default fallback.

methods.name: str _sanitize_filename(name: str)
methods.description: Sanitizes a filename to contain only safe characters: letters, digits, dot, dash, underscore.

methods.name: Tuple[str,int] _validate_mp3(upload: UploadFile, content: bytes)
methods.description: Performs basic validation on an uploaded MP3 file, checking content type, extension, size, and magic headers.

methods.name: List[SongResponse] list_songs()
methods.description: Retrieves and returns a list of all songs in the database, ordered by creation date descending.

methods.name: SongUploadResponse upload_song( file: UploadFile = File(..., description="MP3 file upload (multipart/form-data)"), title: Optional[str] = Form(None, description="Optional title. Defaults to original filename stem."), artist: Optional[str] = Form(None, description="Optional artist. Defaults to 'Unknown Artist'."), )
methods.description: Handles uploading an MP3 file, validating, storing on disk, and recording metadata in the database.

methods.name: stream_song(song_id: uuid.UUID)
methods.description: Streams an MP3 file by song ID if it exists, serving the file directly to the client.
